text: "No Time" is a 1982 song by Australian pop rock band Mondo Rock and is the leading single from their third studio album Nuovo Mondo. It went to number 11 in Australia. == Track listing == # "No Time" (Eric McCusker) - 4:03 # "Il Mondo Caffe" (James Black, Ross Wilson) - 2:48 ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Mondo Rock songs
title: No Time (Mondo Rock song)
